query: What changes were made to inspector qualification requirements in AWS D1.1:2025 Clause 8.14.6.2?
expected_answer: Updated certification and qualification criteria for NDT personnel performing code inspections
rationale: Clause 8.14.6.2 in D1.1:2025 clarifies qualification requirements for inspection personnel, emphasizing alignment with ASNT SNT-TC-1A and ISO 9712 for NDT technicians. This update ensures inspectors have documented competency for advanced methods (PAUT, digital RT) and addresses liability/responsibility boundaries between CWI and engineering roles.
